body_html:
Moreover, we have test in multi-node with unstable network. The worker may finishes before master starting, which results in that master could never exit and export the model.

I don't think it's what we expect. Is there any way to guarantee the master to finish at any situation?

I don't think it's what we expect. Is there any way to guarantee the master to finish at any situation?
body:
Moreover, we have test in multi-node with unstable network. The worker may finishes before master starting, which results in that master could never exit and export the model.

I don't think it's what we expect. Is there any way to guarantee the master to finish at any situation?
